name: Lasagna
author: Denise Glastetter

ingredients.name: box lasagna noodles 32 oz. spaghetti sauce

instructions: Cook lasagna noodles and drain. Brown hamburger; drain. Combine with spaghetti sauce. Blend cottage cheese and egg until smooth. In casserole dish, make 2 layers of: 3 meat sauce, 1/2 noodles, 1/2 cottage cheese mixture and 1/2 Mozzarella cheese. Top with 13 meat sauce. Bake at 375Â° for 30 minutes or until boiling.
